item.name: Execute the transition of a document anchor

formdata.description: (Required)
Whether or not to apply a signature to the document
Field ids contained in the signature metadata
The metadata of the signature
Whether or not to cancel the current pending program and force the execution of a new one

If the user logged in to the API is not assigned to the step and is admin, this parameter allows you to specify for which user (s) he performs the transition by specifying a list of user id. Default : Connected API user only.

response.name: The transition process has been executed

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: oauth2

item.name: Retrieve a list of paginated document Anchors

query.description: Specified whether this request should be an advanced search or not
(**AdvancedSearch**) Is required if no keyword or template type id are provided.
(**AdvancedSearch**) Is required if no keyword or template id are provided.
(**AdvancedSearch**) Will search the keywords only on these global fields when specified.
(**AdvancedSearch**) Will search the keywords only on these global fields when specified.
(**AdvancedSearch**) If true, will only search for words that exactly match the keywords

request.description:
**Infos:**
**Per_page:** This attribute only specify the **maximum potential** result count.
Even if there's still more results to be fetched, the result count could be **less or equal** than the asked per_page.

**Keywords:** Used for both the simple and advanced search.
Required with the **simple search** or if the template id or the template type id **are not provided** with advance search.

item.name: Creations, editions and confirmations of expenses

formdata.description: (Required)

Expense status:
  * 0 - PROCESSING
  * 1 - PENDING_CONFIRMATION
  * 2 - COMPLETED
  * 3 - SUBMITTED
 (This can only be one of 0,1,2,3)
Create an expense for each page in the uploaded file.

Save methods:
  * Put - Creates and send expenses to AI-Services
  * Patch - Updates the expense
  * Post - Creates if required and confirms (completed status) the expense. *No AI-Services
 (This can only be one of put,patch,post)
